attributes.action: Put colour-coded red/amb/green environmental impact labels on consumer packaging
attributes.additional_details:
For example:
 
Post-consumer recycled and recyclable at kerbside cardboard would get green lights. 

A plastic bottle that is only recyclable by speciality services would get a yellow. 

A paper coffee cup that is plastic treated and therefore not recyclable would get red lights. 

Different lights can cover different areas: carbon impact, recyclability, energy efficiency in production, impact to aquatic life, biodegradability, etc
attributes.background: The UK’s food labels are some of the clearest in the world. In this climate emergency, citizens are struggling to make informed decisions about landfill waste, recycling, & carbon impact. Make this easy by enforcing a traffic-light style environmental impact label on any consumer goods packaging
